desc: The Sisters make nearly all their products on their farm in the central valley of California. As the enclaves grow, more products are becoming available from other locations. The Sisters make all their products by the cycles of the moon and have a patent pending for their medicine-making processes.

layout.text: The Sisters’ CBD Plus oil incorporates the raw compounds of the hemp plant (CBDa and CBGa) with the heated forms (CBD and CBG)
